description: Otestujte si svoj anglickou slovn zsobu a zskejte co nejvy skre! Na kad test se mete pipravit procviovnm problematickch slovek.   - Vhodn pro zatenky i pokroilej studenty  - Verze zdarma obsahuje 5 ukzkovch test  - Pln verze obsahuje 38 test se zvyujc se obtnost  - Kad test se skld z 50 otzek k danmu tmatu  - Kompletn databze obsahuje 2300 kvalitnch otzek  - Odpovi vdy obsahuj pklady pouit danho vrazu v praxi  - Aplikace pehrv vslovnost vech odpovd a pklad Test your English vocabulary and get the highest score! For each test, you can prepare by practicing vocabulary problem.  & Nbsp; - Suitable for both beginners and advanced students & Nbsp; - Free version contains 5 sample tests & Nbsp; - Full version contains 38 tests with increasing difficulty & Nbsp; - Each test consists of 50 questions on the subject & Nbsp; - The complete database contains 2300 quality issues & Nbsp; - always answers an example of using the term in the practice & Nbsp; - Application plays the pronunciation of all responses and examples
